title: Chapter 105
body:
Chapter 105

Chapter 105: The great battle with Yao Tianyu

Translator: 549690339

“Love-struck fool, do you think senior brother Lu Ming can win?”

In the southern grandstand, pang Shi could not help but worry for Lu Ming.

“I don’t know!”

Hua Chi shook his head. it’s been a long time since Yao Tianyu fought. Although he’s only ranked 51st, no one knows if he has any trump cards. But I guess that even if he does, he won’t be much stronger than Lu Ming.

Hua Chi said.

“Why?” Pang Shi asked.

“Because Yao Tianyu was afraid.”

“Are you afraid? He’s going to have a life-and-death battle with Lu Ming. Why would he be afraid?”

Pang Shi asked in surprise.

“It’s precisely because he wants to have a life-and-death battle that he is afraid. Lu Ming is too talented. Yao Tianyu knows that if he doesn’t get rid of Lu Ming now, he will not have a chance in the future. He is afraid of Lu Ming’s talent. That’s why he wants to get rid of Lu Ming now.”

Hua Chi analyzed.

“Isn’t lu Ming in danger?” Pang Shi’s expression changed.

“Not necessarily, Lu Ming. I’ve seen through him from the beginning.”

Hua Chi said.

Just then, a few graceful figures appeared in the southern stands. It was Mu Lan, Feng Wu, and the others.

It was obvious that they had rushed over after receiving the news that Lu Ming was challenging the bronze platform.

Elder Mu Lan, Senior Sister Feng Wu.

Pang Shi immediately greeted him when he saw him.

Mu Lan, Feng Wu, and the others went up to pang Shi and the others, and the others made way for them.

Lu Ming has really made it onto the bronze ranking. But isn’t it a little too hasty to have a life-and-death battle with Yao Tianyu now? ”

Feng Wu was both amazed and worried.

“Don’t worry. Lu Ming is very meticulous and not so impulsive. Moreover, since the first day I met him, he has repeatedly exceeded my understanding. I believe that he will not disappoint me today.”

Mu Lan smiled.

Her smile was incomparably charming, causing some of the hot-blooded male disciples to stare with their mouths agape. Some of them even drooled.

It was too alluring.

At this moment, not only Mu Lan and the others, but some other people had also come to the stands. Even a few more geniuses on the bronze rank had come.

Clearly, they had all rushed over after hearing the news.

BOOM! BOOM!

At that moment, on the fighting ring, Lu Ming and Yao Tianyu both released a powerful aura.

Their auras collided in the air, forming a strong wind that swept through the surroundings.

“Lu Ming, I’ll let you see my true abilities now.”

Yao Tianyu howled and a saber appeared in his hand. He took a step forward and slashed at Lu Ming.

A ray of saber radiance burst out. The pale-white saber radiance was more than ten meters long. It cut through the air and the space, slashing toward Lu Ming’s head with a terrifying aura.

“The martial technique that made Yao Tianyu famous, black grade low level saber technique, wind-breaking eight slashes.”

As soon as Yao Tianyu made his move, someone cried out in surprise.

“As expected, I’ve successfully cultivated a profound rank martial skill. Let me test its power.”

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered. He stomped on the ground heavily and shot forward, his sword slashing at Yao Tianyu’s saber.

For the time being, he didn’t need to use his spear technique.

Lu Ming was extremely strong. The huge sword in his hand was as light as a feather.

The giant sword slashed out and destroyed Yao Tianyu’s blade light. The giant sword then heavily hit Yao Tianyu’s saber.

Clang!

An earth-shattering boom rang out, and sparks flew in all directions. The two of them quickly retreated at the same time.

The first move was a tie.

“He blocked it. Lu Ming actually blocked Yao Tianyu’s Black level saber technique.”

Lu Ming must have cultivated the path of body-tempering. With his strong physical body and the integration of martial arts, he was able to unleash a powerful combat power. That’s how he managed to block Yao Tianyu’s Black level saber technique.

physical body against black level saber techniques. Who is stronger? ”

The disciples of the four halls were all staring at the scene.

“Lu Ming, let’s see how many of my attacks you can block?”

Yao Tianyu let out a long howl and attacked like a tidal wave. Saber radiance burst forth and tore through the air, aiming for Lu Ming once again.

Lu Ming wielded his huge sword and engaged Yao Tianyu in a fierce battle.

Clang! Clang!

Violent collisions kept happening, and the sound of explosions continued. The powerful saber radiance and sword Qi surged out, forming a powerful storm that swept in all directions.

At the same time, sword Qi and saber radiance slashed the fighting ring.

However, the fighting stage was extremely hard, and there were even inscriptions on it. Even martial grandmasters couldn’t break it. Sword Qi and Saber Light didn’t leave a mark on it.

The battle was extremely intense. In the blink of an eye, the two of them had exchanged more than thirty moves, and neither of them had a clear winner.

“Yao Tianyu, it seems that you’ve only cultivated the black level saber technique to the second stage. If that’s all you’ve got, then you should just die.”

Lu Ming let out a long howl as his essential Qi surged. He exerted all his strength, and the strength of his essential Qi and physical body exploded.

Of course, Lu Ming did not display the blood Meridian and the ‘fire’ force.

Buzzzzzz!

The combat sword cut through the void, making a terrifying buzzing sound. This sword was much stronger than the previous one.

“Lu Ming did not use his full strength just now.”

Someone exclaimed.

Yao Tianyu’s eyes narrowed. Then, a blood-red light flashed on his body, and a huge Mantis with five blood-red chakras appeared.

Then, the Mantis burrowed itself into Yao Tianyu’s body, and the aura on Yao Tianyu’s body intensified.

Bloodline explosion!

Yao Tianyu’s bloodline was that of the dual-blade Mantis, which greatly enhanced his blade techniques. With the activation of his bloodline, Yao Tianyu’s blade techniques became even sharper and more powerful.

Clang!

There was another explosion, and the two of them retreated again.

After Lu Ming took a step back, he stomped on the ground and charged forward again. Yao Tianyu did the same.

The two of them were like two cannonballs, heavily crashing together.

Clang! Clang!

In just a few breaths, the two of them had exchanged more than ten moves.

At the scene, everyone held their breath as they watched unblinkingly. It was too intense and exciting.

BOOM!

With another move, the two of them trembled and slid back a dozen meters before they could stabilize themselves.

“Yao Tianyu, is this your full strength? I’m really disappointed. As soon as two minutes are up, your bloodline power will disappear, and you won’t be able to fight me. ”

Lu Ming’s indifferent voice was heard.

As soon as Lu Ming finished speaking, the entire venue was filled with whispers.

Lu Ming was right. Once the time for Yao Tianyu’s Blood Meridian outbreak was over, how was he going to fight Lu Ming?

how can this be? how can Lu Ming be so powerful? ”

The few young men who followed Yao Tianyu shouted in disbelief.

hahaha, Lu Ming, I admit that you’re very strong. It’s not bad that you can force me to this point. Now, I’ll show you my true strength. I was planning to use it in the great competition of the four courtyards in two months. It’s your honor to use it on you.

At this moment, Yao Tianyu was not afraid. Instead, he laughed out loud.

Then, Yao Tianyu took a step forward, and the fighting ring rumbled. Yao Tianyu’s muscles quickly bulged, and a faint black light appeared on his skin, making him look like a black iron.

...
